duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate motorized riding equipment within the Distribution Center, manually load and/or unload trailers, and move merchandise to designated areas.
Unload trailers of inbound freight, returns, transfers, and supplies. Transport product to appropriate staging areas or processing areas.
Load outbound trailers and route received merchandise to storage areas.
Provide positive identification and utilize handheld radio frequency (R.F.) scanner in a safe manner.
Perform safety checks, assist in daily cleanup duties, and repetitively lift up to 50lb.
Routinely and consistently drive equipment 75% or greater of time in position. Perform all other duties as assigned.
Minimum age 18, Drug Test, Criminal Record Check, successful completion of a driving test and written test is required.

Perform duties within scope of general company policies, procedures, and objectives. Analyze problems and perform needs assessments. Use judgment in adapting broad guidelines to achieve desired result. Regular exercise of independent judgment within accepted practices. Make recommendations that affect policies, procedures, and practices.

education_certification.credential: Minimum age 18, Drug Test, Criminal Record Check, successful completion of a driving test and written test is required.
